Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the attribution of the quote to Abraham Lincoln.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Abraham Lincoln said or wrote the quoted words, when in fact they were said about him by Robert Ingersoll.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Abraham Lincoln did not actually utter or write the quoted words.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim provides an alternative explanation for the origin of the quote, attributing it to Robert Ingersoll instead of Abraham Lincoln.
